reviewText: This movie was all around horrible, the only thing about it thats worth a damn at all was that the girls weren't that bad looking at all. As I was watching, it was difficult to tell if they were actually trying to make a movie or copy a Japanese porno. A new girl shows up in an office and quickly finds out that the fastest way to the top is by using her natural assets as she see's her co-workers doing so. Thats pretty much it as far as the plot, the movie itself is full of clearly simulated sex scenes. One in particular where a couple was having sex in an office and then moved to the restroom but when they did, the guy didn't even make it look like he had to re-penetrate he just started bumping up against her rear end and she made fake moans as if we the viewer are stupid enough to buy off on that. Just rent a porno, forget this flick, complete waste of time...
